thread.title: Analysis: An apology at last for Clinton over her email use
thread.title_full: Analysis: An apology at last for Clinton over her email use

title: Analysis: An apology at last for Clinton over her email use
text: Analysis: An apology at last for Clinton over her email use By Associated Press | September 8, 2015 @ 3:12 pm In this Sept. 7, 2015, photo, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks during an interview with The Associated Press in Cedar Rapids, Iowa. Clinton says her use of a private email account was a "mistake," adding that she is "sorry" and takes responsibility for the decision. Clinton offers the apology in an interview with ABC News on Tuesday after declining to do so previously. On Sept. 4, she didn't apologize for using a private email system when asked directly by NBC News. In an interview with The Associated Press on Monday, she said an apology wasn't necessary because what she did was "allowed" by the State Department. (AP Photo/Charlie Neibergall)
